## SyncDataLoaderComponent.\_loadData() method

Loads data from 'source'

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected _loadData(force?: boolean): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  force | <code>boolean</code> | Indication that data should be reloaded even if nothing changed |

`Promise<void>`
